content.content: I came across this and it got me pumped up. We need more positive press out there to onboard.  Due to the fact that there are so many negative stories that come from the press, stuff like this is a great way to counter the negative things the media loves to publish about this space. Not to mention, It’s always good to see Maker winning. Maker DAO continues to outperform Compound- for following reasons
The media being what they are, it’s positive right now to have positive news for the ecosystem in general, MKR breaks $1K again

There is a power to positive thinking and things are presently looking better. We need to work together and not try to censor each other. I also wish the people that flag posts they don’t agree with would not be anon.

Happiness and positivism are contagious, MakerDAO has a lot of news potential and above all it moves a community of great people with great visions. haha about the flaged messages well there is a reason then it turns into a witch hunt.
